mapper.sql: select date_format(orderlist_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as orderlist_date, sum(orderlist_cost) as orderlist_cost from orderlist group by date(orderlist_date) order by orderlist_date desc

select date_format(DATE_SUB(orderlist_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(orderlist_date)-1) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AS StartDate, date_format(DATE_SUB(orderlist_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(orderlist_date)-7) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AS EndDate, date_format(orderlist_date, '%Y%u') as orderlist_date, sum(orderlist_cost) as orderlist_cost from orderlist group by week(orderlist_date) order by orderlist_date desc
select date_format(orderlist_date,'%Y-%m') as orderlist_date, sum(orderlist_cost) as orderlist_cost from orderlist group by month(orderlist_date),year(orderlist_date) order by orderlist_date desc
